typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		npi as string,
		nppes_provider_last_org_name as string,
		nppes_provider_first_name as string,
		nppes_provider_city as string,
		nppes_provider_state as string,
		specialty_description as string,
		description_flag as string,
		drug_name as string,
		generic_name as string,
		bene_count as integer,
		total_claim_count as integer,
		total_30_day_fill_count as double,
		total_day_supply as integer,
		total_drug_cost as double,
		bene_count_ge65 as integer,
		bene_count_ge65_suppress_flag as string,
		total_claim_count_ge65 as integer,
		ge65_suppress_flag as string,
		total_30_day_fill_count_ge65 as double,
		total_day_supply_ge65 as integer,
		total_drug_cost_ge65 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(year = "2013") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		year,
		npi,
		nppes_provider_last_org_name,
		nppes_provider_first_name,
		nppes_provider_city,
		nppes_provider_state,
		specialty_description,
		description_flag,
		drug_name,
		generic_name,
		bene_count,
		total_claim_count,
		total_30_day_fill_count,
		total_day_supply,
		total_drug_cost,
		bene_count_ge65,
		bene_count_ge65_suppress_flag,
		total_claim_count_ge65,
		ge65_suppress_flag,
		total_30_day_fill_count_ge65,
		total_day_supply_ge65,
		total_drug_cost_ge65
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'synapselake',
	folderPath: 'cms-part-d/native',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
